heading: unfriendly skies
subheading: next time you fly klm, you might want to consider leaving fido at home. dutch authorities are considering taking legal action against their national carrier following a report that the airline slaughtered 440 squirrels that were illegally imported from china. according to united press international, the squirrels were shredded after veterinary authorities told the airline to get rid of the animals.
author: wired staff
text: next time you fly klm, you might want to consider leaving fido at home. dutch authorities are considering taking legal action against their national carrier following a report that the airline slaughtered 440 squirrels that were illegally imported from china. according to united press international, the squirrels were shredded after veterinary authorities told the airline to get rid of the animals.
